title: Thank you Riot for such an amazing time at the OPL!
body: Everything about the day was spectacular! Thank you so much for such an amazing experience :D

replies.body: Hey Master Toph I am really glad you had a great day. The team here are so happy with the OPL Final and the reaction from you guys. Hope to see you at up and coming events!

Was a great day, I was fortunate to speak with Gyspylord, FeralPony, Terra and Sephyr. They were all full of energy and so excited to be here. Thanks for putting on a great event and showing everyone that we are capable of having an awesome esports scene here. :)
Glad you got to do the Champion Workshops. See you at an event soon!
The twitch stream chat was spam like always, though Phreak dropped in to say hi
An OPL shirt, Forsaken Jayce, a logitech mousepad, glowing batons and some other goodies :)

> [{quoted}](name=Master Toph,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=PJmytb6E,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-09T00:36:47.747+0000)
>
> An OPL shirt, Forsaken Jayce, a logitech mousepad, glowing batons and some other goodies :)

oh wow, not even an oceania specific skin - </3
Would someone like to donate a forsaken jayce skin code
